system.description: The character's charges are devastating, their momentum adding armor-piercing power and crushing impact to their strikes.
system.benefit: When the character makes a melee attack as part of a Charge Action or Crushing Charge Mounted Special Action, their attack gains Felling(Weapon Skill Bonus/2), rounded up. Additionally, when character makes a melee attack as part of a Crushing Charge Mounted Special Action, they deal additional damage equal to the Mount's Strength Bonus.

specialAbilities.name: Crushing Charge
specialAbilities.description: Charge attacks gain Felling (WS Bonus/2, rounded up). Mounted crushing charges add Mount's Strength Bonus to damage.
